<small>Also see: **<big>[[H8371|שָׁתַת]]</big>** | **<big>[[H7817|שָׁחַח]]</big>**</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּחַ‎</span>] **verb** ==sink down== ([[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] distinguishes this as II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***sink down***, [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>9, 23</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשוח‎</span> probably ***depression, excavation, reservoir***, so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אשיךְ‎</span> [[Eccl.50.3|Eccl 50:3]]), and hence <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֫חָה‎</span> [[Prov.2.18|Prov 2:18]], si vera lectio, and following derivatives, from I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> ***melt away*** Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***flow and spread, melt away***, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cause to dwindle***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***phthisis***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שׁוּחַ‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***flow*** or ***melt away, vanish***), whence [[Lam.3.20|Lam 3:20]]; [[Ps.44.26|Ps 44:26]] but insufficient evidence for I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> in Hebrew); — ***sink down***, **Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֫חָה לֶעָפָר נַפְשֵׁנוּ‎</span> [[Ps.44.26|Ps 44:26]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּֽבְקָה לָאָרֶץ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלמָֿוֶת בֵּיתָהּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Prov.2.18|Prov 2:18]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלרְֿפָאִים‎</span>; but <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> masculine, read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחָה‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁחה‎</span>, [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW xvi (1896), 82</sup>, so Toy); ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּשׁוּחַ עָלַי נַפְשִׁי‎</span> [[Lam.3.20|Lam 3:20]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]], **Hiph\`il** ==declar.== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּשִׁיחַ‎</span> [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], of depression of mind. — [[Ps.49.15|Ps 49:15]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחוּ‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁתּוּ‎</span> but see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁתת‎</span>. — 

**Hithpa\`el** [[Ps.42|Ps 42]]; [[Ps.43|Ps 43]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁחח‎</span>.
